Just a word of encouragment and appreciation for the peoplw who make MRM possible
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Just a word of encouragment and appreciation for the peoplw who make MRM possible
By krlozemelexista13 on Tuesday, May 1, 2012 - 04:31 am:

English is not my first language, but I've been a fan of this site for over 10 years now and until a few years back I have been able to fully understand the extension of this site. I do not want to bring bad memories but I have always been very curious about the crisis that lead to the creation of this site (with the hacker situation and all) and how people like you, moderators and contributors, were able to do to save and restore what today is the MRM.
I just want to say THANK YOU! to all the people who continiously worked to forge this wonderful and very helpful site for all of us Monster Rancher lovers.
